mapper.select: SELECT medicine_no AS medicineNo ,medicine_name AS medicineName ,medicine_manufacturer AS medicineManufacturer ,medicine_material AS medicineMaterial ,medicine_storage_method AS medicineStorageMethod ,medicine_valid_term AS medicineValidTerm ,medicine_etc_otc AS medicineEtcOtc ,medicine_class AS medicineClass ,medicine_appear AS medicineAppear ,medicine_pack AS medicinePack ,medicine_permission_date AS medicinePermissionDate FROM medicine WHERE medicine_name like '%#{medicineName}%'
